Vulnerabilities.title: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Vulnerabilities.description: The software does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes user-controllable input before it is placed in output that is used as a web page that is served to other users.

Vulnerabilities.title: [CVE-2020-28168] Axios NPM package 0.21.0 contains a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerabi...
Vulnerabilities.description: Axios NPM package 0.21.0 contains a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability where an attacker is able to bypass a proxy by providing a URL that responds with a redirect to a restricted host or IP address.
